Detailed Description

Utility class for Gunzip-function.

Should be portable and multiplatform so don't do anything without thinking about that. <br /> FIXME: CRC-check.

int GunzipUtil::gunzip (  unsigned char *  outBuffer,
int  outlen,
const unsigned char *  inBuffer,
int  inlen
)  [static]
 

Tries to uncompress the inbuffer into the outbuffer.

If something goes wrong a negative number is returned otherwise the length of the uncompressed data.

Parameters:
outBuffer The uncompressed data is put here.
outlen The available space in the outbuffer.
inbuffer Buffer to read the compressed data from.
inlen Length of compressed data.
Returns:
Number of bytes consumed.

bool GunzipUtil::implemented (   )  [static]
 

Returns true if the Gunzip-util is properly implemented on this platform.

bool GunzipUtil::isGzip (  const unsigned char *  inBuffer  )  [static]
 

Checks if the two first bytes are the magic gzip ones.

Parameters:
inBuffer Buffer to check if the two first bytes are the magic gzip ones. Must be two bytes long!
Returns:
True if the two first bytes are the magic gzip ones, false if not.

Returns the gunzipped length of the compressed inBuffer.

inlen The length of the inBuffer.
